setup_script_description: sets focus on a link after the grid
specific_user_instruction: Navigate to the last cell in the grid. Note: you may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the grid and the last cell.
output_assertions: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
Text of the last column header ('Balance') is conveyed
Text of the last cell ('$995,532.00') is conveyed
Coordinates of the last cell (column 5, row 7) are conveyed
